this_title: Childhood Rivalry in Bali and New Guinea
introduction: Depicts sibling rivalry among children of the same age in the two cultures of Bali and New Guinea by showing how they respond to the mother attending to another baby, the ear piercing of a younger sibling, and the experimental presentation of a doll. From the Character Formation in Different Cultures series. Produced by Gregory Bateson and Margaret Mead. 1954
chinese_title: Childhood Rivalry in Bali and New Guinea
